description:
Now that Keroro`s gotten his very first allowance money, he`s determined to go buy a rare Gundam model with it.  But he can`t exactly do that while he`s invisible.  Time to beg for Fuyuki`s help!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le magasin de jouets / Une maquette pour Keroro
Omocha o Ai Suru Otoko-tachi no Uta de Arimasu
おもちゃを愛する男達の歌 であります
